text: jab Allah taâ€™ala ne nabiyo se ahadh liya ke jo kuch main tumhe kitaab wa hikmath do, phir tumhaare paas wo rasool aaye, jo tumhaare paas ki cheez ko sach bataaye, to tumhaare liye us par imaan laana aur us ki madad karna zarori hai, farmaaya ke tum us ke eqraari15 ho aur us par mera zimma le rahe ho? sab ne kaha ke hamein iqraar hai, farmaaya to ab gawaah raho aur khud main bhi tumhaare saath gawaaho mein ho
